Step 2.Planning: Take the white sauce bottle out of the cabinet

Step 3.Planning: Take the pea pod out of the bowl

Step 4.Planning: Take the bowl out of the electric refrigerator

Step 5.Planning: Put the pea pod into the casserole

Step 6.Planning: Pour the cheese sauce from the white sauce bottle into the casserole

Step 7.Planning: Put the casserole into the oven and cook it
